alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Calhoun, south central Victoria, southeastern Goliad and northeastern Refugio Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McFaddin, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McFaddin and Quintana. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 592 and 614. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
